channel.title: Dan Friedman's Data Science Knowledge Base

item.title: Rank Scores via Leetcode
item.description: Medium level Leetcode SQL problem and explanation of ranking scores using a window function
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Self Join
item.description: Self join a table in python and pandas
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Rising Temperature
item.description: SQL problem and step-by-step explanation of identifying days with higher temperature than previous day
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Score Deviation from Mean
item.description: SQL problem to find the deviation of scores from their mean. Requires use of a window function.
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Find Three Consecutive Numbers via Leetcode
item.description: Medium level Leetcode SQL problem and step-by-step explanation of identifying a unique number that is repeated three times consecutively in a table through using window functions
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Department Top Three Salaries via Leetcode
item.description: Advanced Leetcode SQL problem and step-by-step explanation of identifying top employees in departments by salary through using window functions
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Command Line Basic Minesweeper
item.description: Medium Python algorithm prototype of a basic version of Minesweeper as a command line game
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Spearman's Correlation
item.description: Learn Spearman's correlation to measure the strength and direction of association between two numerical variables
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Pearson's Correlation
item.description: Learn Pearson's correlation to understand the linear relationship between two continuous numerical variables
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Correlation Does Not Imply Causation
item.description: Understand what is correlation in statistics and how to interpet this statistic
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman
